offline-message: Your device has no internet connection
offline-reconnect-message: Will connect once the device goes online

snackbar-disabled-message.offline: Disabled when there is no internet connection
snackbar-disabled-message.error: Disabled when there is an error

modes-dialog.title: Mode selection
modes-dialog.privacy-description: Enjoy maximum-level privacy by routing your connection through 5 servers via mixnet. Perfect for securely handling payments, emails, and messages.
modes-dialog.fast-description: Experience maximum speed with 2-server connectivity. This mode leverages AmneziaWG, a censorship-resistant version of WireGuard, ideal for fast browsing, streaming, and file sharing.
